title: The Amazing Spider-Man: The Death of Gwen Stacy
description: In this shocking and moving story, the Green Goblin and Spider-Man face off atop the George Washington Bridge, with Gwen's life hanging in the balance.Collects The Amazing Spider-Man (1963) #96-98, 121-122 and Webspinners: Tales of Spider-Man (1999) #1
author: Gerry Conway
